subject: Jazz
lead_paragraph: The Utah Jazz will be opening the regular season without its top player. Point guard Deron Williams would be out for at least two weeks with a sprained ankle, the Jazz said Monday, two days after Williams was injured in a preseason game at Chicago.
snippet: The Utah Jazz will be opening the regular season without its top player. Point guard Deron Williams would be out for at least two weeks with a sprained ankle, the Jazz said Monday, two days after Williams was injured in a preseason game at Chicago.
